answers.answer: let me ask you a question.. this morning when i woke up i was really dizzy.. my period is due the 23rd and my periods are always on time..ive also felt sick to my stomach.. im wondering if the dizzyness and sick feeling could be pregnancy symptoms?? i dont know whats going on.. i know its to early to test.. im feeling better after waking up and eating and drinking some water.. ive never had this before.. i dont know what it is.. i dont have a blood pressure problem or diabetes.. any thoughts?? it kinda scares me.. but wouldnt it scare you??~*Chloe*~

Teee hee heee..Chloe, Kazoo-Thanks.. At least I'm not the only one.As far as your bodies doing weird things, I guess it's normal for pregnance and AF.. Who knows.In the meantime, I'm counting the days. (As I promised myself I wouldn't this month.. yeah, right.):)So, are you both planning on testing before AF is expected, or after?-Heather

Hey Chloe,We are around the same cycle...I have a bunch of funny things happening(feels like my period is going to start any minute now, my boobs hurt and I have been getting some wicked headaches...The best thing I can suggest is to try to forget about it.  I know you are anxious but if you think about it too much, you will start to see symptoms that are not there and you may convince yourself that you are pg.  If you do that then you will be super disappointed if the hpt comes back negative.  If you set your mind on something else and take the test next week (after not overthinking it) and it comes back + you will be even more surprized than if you had expected it to come back +.Sorry, pretty long winded, Heather...my suggestion, DON'T watch 'A Baby Story'  It'll just drive you nuts!!Kazoo
After, no sense testing early only to expect a negative result.  Test later and be sure...

I very interested in finding out what is going on with the both of you. I am going on 3 weeks late and last week had negative test results. My Dr. said my uterus felt enlarged and wanted me to retest in 2 weeks(next week now) I am sooo anxious to find out. I feel pregnant. breasts are firm & are getting bumps on the nipples, nausea, slight cramping and I feel so gassy. let me know how it all works out for you guys.... Good Luck & Baby Dust!

question: Hi all.I'm on the 7 day countdown...No symptoms whatsoever....But also no AF symptoms (which is unusual for me)...Any suggestions for sanity?:)-Heather
title: tick, tick, tick..... hmmm... tick, tick, tic......
